member.name: P:NotepadX.My.Resources.Resources.data_ADJ
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to .22 caliber|of or relating to the bore of a gun (or its ammunition) that measures twenty-two hundredths of an inch in diameter - "a .22 caliber pistol" .38 caliber|of or relating to the bore of a gun (or its ammunition) that measures thirty-eight hundredths of an inch in diameter - "a .38 caliber shell" .45 caliber|of or relating to the bore of a gun (or its ammunition) that measures forty-five hundredths of an inch in diameter a cappella|without musical accompaniment - "they sang an a cappella Mass" a [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:NotepadX.My.Resources.Resources.data_ADV
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to a bit|to a small degree;somewhat - "it's a bit warm" a cappella|without musical accompaniment - "they performed a cappella" a fortiori|with greater reason;for a still stronger, more certain reason - "if you are wrong then, a fortiori, so am I" a la carte|by ordering items listed individually on a menu - "we ate a la carte" a la mode|with ice cream on top or on the side - "we served the apple pie a la mode" a lot|to a very great degree or extent - "I feel a lot better" a posteriori|derived from observe [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:NotepadX.My.Resources.Resources.data_NOUN
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 15 May Organization|a terrorist organization formed in 1979 by a faction of the Popular Front for the Liberation of Palestine but disbanded in the 1980s when key members left to join a faction of al-Fatah 18-karat gold|an alloy that contains 75 per cent gold 1900s|the decade from 1900 to 1909 22-karat gold|an alloy that contains 87 per cent gold 24/7|uptime is 24 hours a day 7 days a week 24-karat gold|100 per cent gold 401-k plan|a retirement savings plan that is funded by employee contributions and [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:NotepadX.My.Resources.Resources.data_VRB
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to abacinate|blind by holding a red-hot metal plate before someone's eyes - "The prisoners were abacinated by their captors" abandon|forsake, leave behind - "We abandoned the old car in the empty parking lot";give up with the intent of never claiming again;leave someone who needs or counts on you;leave in the lurch;stop maintaining or insisting on;of ideas or claims - "He abandoned the thought of asking for her hand in marriage" abate|become less in amount or intensity - "The storm will abate" abbreviate|sh [rest of string was truncated]";.
